entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
